description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Le Père-Lachaise; recueil général alphabétique des concessions perpétuelles établies dans ce lieu, précédé des tarifs des pompes funèbres, du prix des terrains, des lois, décrets, ordonnances et arrêtés sur la matière, avec notes explicatives, vues et plan, etc" Author: SALOMON, F. T. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10170.d.3." Page: 357 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1855 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003233665 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
